candidates.title: Specify which examples to build
candidates.body: When switching branches with different directories in `examples/`, `cargo build` fails because subdirectories exist (usually with only a `.butane` subdirectory)

candidates.title: Add Derive FieldType support for newtypes
Add CLI backend subcommand
candidates.body: Has some minor backwards incompatibilities in `ms.create_migration`, which could be avoided, however the next release already has a few such as removal of `.state`.

candidates.title: Use clap derive
candidates.body:
Several times when trying to add options, especially when there were positional args, I ran into *runtime* conflicts between the options I specified and the attempts to get the arg/option value.

I find the derive syntax much simpler, and any errors occur at compile time instead of runtime, speeding up the development of enhancements.

Also given butane is using similar struct-centric design, IMO this is more in tune with the design of butane.

candidates.title: Allow running tests with various features
Remove need for lazy_static in cli
Replace tempdir with tempfile
candidates.body:
tempdir suffers from https://osv.dev/RUSTSEC-2018-0017

Also bumps other dependencies.

repo.name: butane
repo.description: An ORM for Rust with a focus on simplicity and on writing Rust, not SQL
